Welcome to June

  • Meniereâ€™s Disease: triad of tinnitus, vertigo, and sensorineural hearing loss, due to increased volume of endolymph secondary to impaired resorption and subsequent damage to the vestibular and cochlear compartments.
  • Labrynthitis: inflammation of the vestibular labyrinth, p/w acute onset vertiginous symptoms
  • Otosclerosis: conductive hearing loss secondary to bony overgrowth of the stapes
